meanings.definition: The act of interpreting something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: Her misinterpretations of the instructions led to confusion.
meanings.sent2: There were many misinterpretations of the data in the report.
meanings.sent3: His misinterpretations of the magic trick made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The misinterpretations in her mind created a maze of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The misinterpretations in the painting made it hard to understand.

meanings.definition: A mistaken understanding or explanation of something.
meanings.sent1: The misinterpretations of the story changed its meaning.
meanings.sent2: We need to clarify any misinterpretations of the rules.
meanings.sent3: Their misinterpretations of the joke made it even funnier.
meanings.sent4: The misinterpretations in his mind clouded his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The misinterpretations in the book made it hard to follow.
